skins.shipDescription: Mahan-class destroyer - Cassin, Hull Number DD-372!
skins.selfIntroduction: Mahan-class destroyer, Cassin. I get picked on for being top heavy and not being great at defending the skies... My left eye has nothing to do with the Solomon Islands, alright? Just leave it.
skins.acquisition: How do you do? I'm Cassin... If you have no business with me, I'd like to stay in the docks...
skins.login: Even you can't make me leave my room, Commander...
skins.details: I don't have anything you'd be interested in...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Don't you have anything to say? I'm not great at starting conversations...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Oh, you want to know about my eyes? One of them is fake... Can you guess which?
skins.secretaryTouch: Mmm... I don't hate this feeling...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Are you interested in shut-in girls?

skins.shipDescription: Commander... I've been cocoooned up in my room for so long that I've started to metamorphize... Eh? It's because of the retrofit? Phew... thank goodness. Well then, guess it's time to go back to my room.
skins.acquisition: Commander... I've been cocoooned up in my room for so long that I've started to metamorphize... Eh? It's because of the retrofit? Phew... thank goodness. Well then, guess it's time to go back to my room.
skins.details: Fwaah... Commander, I need to take another nap, so I'm leaving the rest to you...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Mmh... just staying together quietly like this... might be pretty nice too.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Wear my clothes properly? Eh...? Don't wanna~ More importantly, care for an Oxy Cola, Commander?
